text.section:
For purposes of any law or rule relating to members of a nonstock corporation, the directors of a nonstock corporation, under either of the circumstances described in subsection (b) of this section:
Also constitute the members of the corporation; and
When meeting as directors, may exercise the rights and powers of members.

This section applies if:
Neither the charter nor the bylaws of the corporation provide for members; or
The nonstock corporation in fact has no members.
